## Welcome!

This website, developed by the [Bioinformatics Team (BIT)](https://www.carrerasresearch.org/es/unidad-de-bioinform%C3%A1tica_130420) a the [Josep Carreras Leukaemia Research Institute (IJC)](https://www.carrerasresearch.org/en) serves as a repository for materials and links related to our workshops. We invite you to share any comments or thoughts you may have or any topic you would like to propose!

Current topics

-   R (base) and the Tidyverse
-   Bioconductor
-   Linux and beyond
-   High performance computing (HPC)
-   Tools for reproducible research
-   Data visualization
